amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Transportation to take any actions with respect to the financing of passenger rail projects along Florida's East Coast.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Transportation to take any actions with respect to the financing of passenger rail projects along Florida's East Coast.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 260 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 260 (Roll no. 313).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Posey.
